tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE musical_scales (
    scale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scale_name TEXT,
    scale_type TEXT,
    tonic_note TEXT,
    interval_structure TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE musical_scales (
    scale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scale_name VARCHAR(50),
    scale_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE scale_relationships (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scale1_id INT,
    scale2_id INT,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE music_theory (
    theory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    theory_name VARCHAR(50),
    theory_description TEXT
)
